post.author: obihb
post.body:
I started a new topic for this one to finally shed the anchor that is UT3 completely..

As the topic suggests we've been able to totally convert our game demo over to the UDK now. At the same time we've been able to do some small updates to it as well. Thanks to our shiny new programmer.. who just knocked this out in no time.

Enjoy!.

http://www.moddb.com/games/bountyarms

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: Sweet. I'll give it a shot now that it's a stand alone app.

post.author: obihb
post.body:
My friend/college have been rendering out some high res turn tables of the high poly models we made for the 4 main characters for our game. They're just in gray of course we never textured them. I thought I'd mention it here for anyone interested in seeing those.

http://forums.epicgames.com/showthread. ... 481&page=7
